name: Get to the door (HeroHunter)
description:
You get to the door, and thats it. The controls are shown on the first level, and from there you can figure it all out. I am still new to game development when making this though, so it might not be that good. Also all the art is made with the default godot icon.

To install on windows, extract the zip file, open the folder in there, and run the exe.

On the web version of the game the door at the end of level 3 is bugged. This only happens on the html5 version and not on the windows version. Sorry, and I dont know how to fix this.
